text: Yamashina is a Japanese family name, and can stand for: * Yamashina-no-miya (山階) ōke (princely house), the third oldest branch of the Japanese Imperial Family created from branches of the Fushimi-no-miya house, presently extinct * Yamashina-ku, Kyoto * Yamashina Botanical Research Institute * Yamashina Institute for Ornithology * Yamashina Mido * (1900–1989), Japanese ornithologist * Yamashina Station * Yamashina Oyakata, elder name in sumo currently held by Sadanofuji Akihiro == References == Category:Japanese- language surnames
title: Yamashina
